pages.text: Dracopristis is a ctenacanthiform shark from the Carboniferous period. Its name means Dragon Shark. It had 12 rows of short teeth and it had spines on its dorsal fins. It was around 2 meters long and it likely hunted small fish and crustaceans, being an ambush hunter.
